title: CryptoCard Dashboard
summary: A responsive cryptocurrency dashboard with live charts, coin filtering, and predictive performance indicators.
details: CryptoCard was designed as a modern crypto analytics dashboard to give users a clear, interactive view of market performance...
features: Wide responsive chart with range selector
Coin cards with sparklines and % change indicators
Search bar with icon, button, and filters
Local storage persistence for last searched coin
challenges: Ensuring charts were responsive and contained across devices, integrating live API data smoothly.
impact: Delivered a modern crypto dashboard that improves user insight into market trends.

title: Sella Ecommerce Website
summary: A modern ecommerce platform built for Sella, featuring product catalog, cart, checkout, and user profile management.
details: The Sella Ecommerce Website was developed as a comprehensive online shopping solution tailored for Sella’s brand. It integrates a product catalog with filtering and sorting, a shopping cart powered by React Context, secure checkout simulation, and user profile management. The design emphasizes clarity, responsiveness, and accessibility, ensuring a seamless shopping experience across devices. Built with React, TailwindCSS, and Vite, the site also includes authentication flows, category browsing, and a polished contact page with EmailJS integration. The project demonstrates full ecommerce flow mastery, from browsing to checkout, while maintaining performance and design consistency.
features: Product catalog with filtering and sorting
Category browsing and product detail pages
challenges: Integrating multiple flows (auth, cart, checkout, contact) while keeping performance and UX smooth.
impact: Delivered a complete ecommerce platform for Sella, showcasing ability to build complex, user‑friendly applications.
